name: Sarah Nicolas aka Sarah N Fisk

content.html: Just saw "Women who don't want children can get hysterectomies" No we fucking can't. I'm 38 and have been trying since I was 25 with 8 different doctors "What if you change your mind?" No one ever asks parents "what if you change your mind?" Even though that outcome is worse
content.value:
Just saw "Women who don't want children can get hysterectomies" 

No we fucking can't. I'm 38 and have been trying since I was 25 with 8 different doctors

"What if you change your mind?" 

No one ever asks parents "what if you change your mind?" Even though that outcome is worse
